name: Void Control
description:
Void Control is a pool/strategy game.

Be smart and accurate to destroy the Bots of your enemy.

With your meteor, throw your troups through the Outer Space and invade surrounding planets. Arrive in strength and the enemy machines may join your forces. Otherwise, a good old black hole should do the job…

The goal is to be the last one standing on the board.

To fully enjoy the game, the best thing to do is to grab a friend and play on the same computer, or sync with someone to play the online multiplayer mode.

Visit voidcontrol.com

To contact me : @_baabeuf
